breakfast.name: Avocado Toast with Tomatoes
breakfast.instructions: Toast bread until golden. Mash avocado and spread on toast, drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Top with halved cherry tomatoes.

lunch.name: Mediterranean Chickpea Salad
lunch.instructions: Drain and rinse chickpeas. Dice cucumber, halve tomatoes, and thinly slice onion. Toss everything with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.

dinner.name: Garlic Herb Chicken with Roasted Vegetables
dinner.instructions: Season chicken with minced garlic, herbs, salt, and pepper. Roast at 400°F with chopped vegetables tossed in olive oil for 25-30 minutes until chicken reaches 165°F.

breakfast.name: Banana Oatmeal with Almonds
breakfast.instructions: Cook oats with water according to package directions. Top with sliced banana, chopped almonds, and drizzle with honey.

lunch.name: Asian Sesame Noodles
lunch.instructions: Cook pasta, drain and toss with soy sauce and sesame oil. Top with julienned cucumber and sliced green onions. Serve warm or cold.

dinner.name: Salmon with Lemon and Asparagus
dinner.instructions: Place salmon and asparagus on a baking sheet, drizzle with olive oil, minced garlic, and lemon juice. Bake at 400°F for 12-15 minutes until salmon flakes easily.

breakfast.name: Scrambled Eggs with Spinach
breakfast.instructions: Heat oil in pan, add spinach until wilted. Pour in beaten eggs and scramble until cooked. Serve with toasted bread.

lunch.name: Turkey and Avocado Wrap
lunch.instructions: Layer turkey, sliced avocado, spinach, and tomato on tortilla. Season with salt and pepper, roll tightly and slice in half.

dinner.name: Beef Stir-Fry with Brown Rice
dinner.instructions: Cook rice according to package. Stir-fry sliced beef in hot pan until browned, add vegetables and minced garlic, cook 5 minutes. Add soy sauce and serve over rice.

breakfast.name: Berry Smoothie Bowl
breakfast.instructions: Blend berries, banana, and almond milk until thick and smooth. Pour into bowl and top with granola and extra berries if desired.

lunch.name: Tuna Salad Lettuce Wraps
lunch.instructions: Mix drained tuna with diced onion, olive oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper. Spoon mixture into lettuce leaves and wrap.

dinner.name: Herb-Crusted Pork Chop with Sweet Potato
dinner.instructions: Season pork with herbs, garlic, salt and pepper. Bake at 375°F with cubed sweet potato and green beans drizzled with olive oil for 25-30 minutes.

breakfast.name: Peanut Butter Banana Toast
breakfast.instructions: Toast bread until golden. Spread peanut butter on each slice, top with sliced banana and drizzle with honey.

lunch.name: Chicken Caesar-Style Salad
lunch.instructions: Grill or pan-sear seasoned chicken until cooked through, slice. Toss lettuce with olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, salt and pepper. Top with chicken.

dinner.name: Shrimp Tacos with Cabbage Slaw
dinner.instructions: Season and cook shrimp in pan until pink, about 3 minutes per side. Mix shredded cabbage with lime juice. Fill tortillas with shrimp, slaw, and sliced avocado.

breakfast.name: Veggie Scramble with Toast
breakfast.instructions: Sauté diced pepper and spinach in olive oil until soft. Add beaten eggs and scramble until cooked. Serve with toasted bread.

lunch.name: Black Bean and Rice Bowl
lunch.instructions: Cook rice according to package. Heat black beans with cumin and garlic powder. Serve beans over rice, topped with diced tomato, avocado, and lime juice.

dinner.name: Lemon Herb Chicken Thighs with Quinoa
dinner.instructions: Cook quinoa according to package. Season chicken with lemon juice, herbs, salt and pepper, bake at 400°F with sliced zucchini for 25 minutes. Serve over quinoa.

breakfast.name: Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal
breakfast.instructions: Cook oats with water and cinnamon. Dice apple and add to oats during last 2 minutes of cooking. Top with chopped almonds.

lunch.name: Greek-Style Chicken Pita
lunch.instructions: Cook seasoned chicken until done, slice. Stuff pita with chicken, diced cucumber, tomato, and drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil.

dinner.name: Teriyaki Salmon with Stir-Fried Vegetables
dinner.instructions: Cook rice. Mix soy sauce with honey and brush on salmon, bake at 400°F for 12 minutes. Stir-fry vegetables until tender-crisp. Serve salmon over rice with vegetables.
